title: Document Management
description: Secure storage, organization, and collaboration for all legal documents
overview: The Document Management System (DMS) provides a comprehensive solution for storing, organizing, and managing all your legal documents. With enterprise-grade security, version control, template libraries, and seamless integration with cases and clients, the DMS ensures your documents are always organized, accessible, and secure.

keyFeatures.title: Secure Cloud Storage
keyFeatures.description: Bank-level encryption with role-based access controls and audit trails

keyFeatures.title: Version Control
keyFeatures.description: Track document versions, changes, and maintain complete revision history

keyFeatures.title: Template Library
keyFeatures.description: Pre-built legal document templates with smart field population

keyFeatures.title: Folder Organization
keyFeatures.description: Hierarchical folder structure with custom tags and metadata

keyFeatures.title: Advanced Search
keyFeatures.description: Full-text search across documents with advanced filtering options

keyFeatures.title: Collaboration Tools
keyFeatures.description: Share documents, collect signatures, and collaborate in real-time
